Aquisition: Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant West Altus Plateau for 3500 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Tree-and-Beast Surcoat
Description: Armor worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.The surcoat depicts the distant Erdtree and the beast regent, an emblem of the golden lineage.Both are symbols of glory now past.
Aquisition: Dropped by Godrick Soldiers.Easily farmed at the Gatefront Ruins.

name: Twinned Armor (Altered)
Description: Armor depicting entwined twins of gold and silver.The two known as D are inseparable twins. They are two bodies and two minds, but a single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another.Perhaps this armor longs to find its way to the other D.
Aquisition: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Twinned Armor into Twinned Armor (Altered).

name: Twinned Armor
Description: Armor depicting entwined twins of gold and silver. The two known as D are inseparable twins.They are of two bodies and two minds, but one single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another.Perhaps this armor longs to find its way to the other D.
Aquisition: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D, Hunter of the Dead. Elden Ring Map here

name: Upper-Class Robe
Description: Embroidered, bright green robe worn by noble children. Donning such a robe is traditionally the child's first show of burgeoning independence.
Aquisition: Can be found at Leyndell Royal Capital, at the end of the passageway where you fight a few Perfumers.Elden Ring Map hereCan be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for 2,400 Runes.

name: Vagabond Knight Armor (Altered)
Description: Chest piece of a knight banished from their motherland. Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey. The crest emblazoned on the front is worn and dingy, no longer able to evoke sentiment. Metal armor is heavy, but also sturdy, offering significant damage negation.
Aquisition: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Vagabond Knight Armor into Vagabond Knight Armor (Altered).

name: Vagabond Knight Armor
Description: Chest piece of a knight banished from their motherland. Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.The crest emblazoned on the front is worn and dingy, no longer able to evoke sentiment.Metal armor is heavy, but also study ordering significant damage negation.
Aquisition: Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Veteran's Armor (Altered)
Description: Old armor that has seen many battles. Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol. Niall was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master. This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.
Aquisition: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Veteran's Armor into Veteran's Armor (Altered).

name: Veteran's Armor
Description: Old armor that has seen many battles. Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol. Niall was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master. This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.
Aquisition: Can be purchased from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after killing Commander Niall at Castle Sol Rooftop.

name: Vulgar Militia Armor
Description: Armor worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. This is where the vulgar militia serve, as untiring, unsung watchkeepers.
Aquisition: The Vulgar Militia Armor Chest Armor can be found by killing Vulgar Militiamen enemies found around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

name: War Surgeon Gown (Altered)
Description: Bloodstained white gown of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers. Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood, none were able to tame the accursed blood. None but Varre, that is; though he was an exception.
Aquisition: Defeat all three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the blood swamp near the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum.

name: War Surgeon Gown
Description: "Bloodstained white gown of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers.Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood none were able to tame the accursed blood.None but Varre, that is; though he was an exception."
Aquisition: Revert the War Surgeon Gown (Altered) at a site of grace.

name: White Reed Armor
Description: Armor of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inaba, head disciples of the great swordsman Okina. The Inaba traveled in pursuit of not only the master who abandoned them, but also proper deaths, won honorably through hard-fought combat. To be a White Reed is to seek death; fitting for the Inaba, who desired nothing more than to die by the sword.
Aquisition: Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Gauntlets and White Reed Greaves can also be found on this corpse.Elden Ring Map here

name: Zamor Armor
Description: Armor worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.
Aquisition: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants.Elden Ring Map here

name: Ansbach's Attire (Altered)
Description: Attire of Sir Ansbach. Black cloth adorned with gold embroidery. Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills.
Special effect: Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills by 3%.
Aquisition: Alter Ansbach's Atirre at a Site of Grace.

name: Ansbach's Attire
Description: Attire of Sir Ansbach. The embroidered crest of the Pureblood Knights has now all but faded away. Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills. Ansbach understood that keeping his oath to his old master was not an act of logic, nor would it bear any justice, but it was for these very reasons he was unable to let go.
Special effect: Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills by 3%.
Aquisition: Complete Sir Ansbach's questline all the way through the end, and side with him when facing Leda, and then Promised Consort Radahn/ Radahn, Consort of Miquella. After the fight is over, Sir Ansbach's body will be near the site of grace, alongside with his equipment and his Incantation. [Map Link]

name: Armor of Night
Description: Bottomless black chest armor, cool to the touch.Flowing lines in the seeming shape of a fingerprint adorn the surface. Imprisons the wearer in utterly lightless dark.Bestowed upon those born deep underground, ordaining them as Swordhands of Night.
Aquisition: Bonny Gaol: Use the jar lift near the bridge twice to reach the top level of the gaol. First, hop on the jar, go to the bridge level, and activate the switch. Ride the jar lift for the second time to go to the top level. You can find the Night Set on a corpse laying on top of a table. [See SOTE Elden Ring DLC Map] [Video Link]

name: Armor of Solitude (Altered)
Description: Steel chest armor of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol. Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel. The nameless mausoleums of the realm of shadow are said to hold the spirits of warriors who lost their names, or their hearts.
Aquisition: Alter Armor of Solitude at any site of grace.

name: Armor of Solitude
Description: Steel chest armor of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol. Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel, and bedecked with a black cloak. The nameless mausoleums of the realm of shadow are said to hold the spirits of warriors who lost their names, or their hearts.
Aquisition: Can be obtained after defeating the Blackgaol Knight found inside Northern Nameless Mausoleum. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Black Knight Armor
Description: Armor worn by the Black Knights, servants of Messmer the Impaler. Though the engraving above the heart is a Scadutree design, it is etched in gold. A small consolation to those forced to wage a war without grace or honor.
Aquisition: Black Knight Set pieces are dropped from Black Knights, found throughout the Lands of Shadow.

name: Braided Cord Robe
Description: Ragged black cloth overlaid with braided cord. Attire of a vengeance-seeking hornsent. The braided cord ties together the vow of the revenger with the victims' grudges. It must never come undone. Enhances both watchful spirits and the vengeful spirits summoned by horned bairns.
Special effect: Enhances watchful and vengeful spirits summoned by horned bairns by 15%.
Aquisition: Complete Hornsent quest. [Video Location]

name: Common Soldier Cloth Armor
Description: Cloth armor of the rank-and-file soldiers of Messmer's army. A pitch-dark soot clings to it, much like the inner faces of the men who wore them.
Aquisition: Drop by soldiers in Castle Ensis

name: Dancer's Dress (Altered)
Description: Altered form of the deep crimson dress of the Ranah dancers. These are the black undergarments worn beneath. Enhances the power of dancing attacks.
Special effect: Enhances the power of dancing attacks by 2.5%.
Aquisition: Alter Dancer's Dress.

name: Dancer's Dress
Description: Bright-red dress of the Ranah dancers. Enhances the power of dancing attacks. The dance of Ranah is one of burning passion, and the most passionate dancers never allow their fiery dance to end, losing even their names as they dance on. To see the passion fade is to see the dancer's flame extinguished.
Special effect: Enhances the power of dancing attacks by 2.5%.
Aquisition: Dropped by defeating Dancer of Ranah at the Southern Nameless Mausoleum [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Interactive Map]

name: Death Knight Armor
Description: Golden armor of the Death Knights, adorned with an antiquated depiction of the Erdtree. Enhances skills and incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. These knights, once Godwyn's personal guard, quested to find their transfigured master's cadaver surrogatefor the coming age of the Duskborn.
Special effect: Enhances skills and incantations of the ancient dragon cult by 2%.
Aquisition: Darklight Catacombs, on a Death Knight corpse

name: Divine Beast Warrior Armor
Description: Armor of feted horned warriors chosen to become divine beast warriors, adorned with a lion's pelt. Among the divine beast warriors, only those who truly excel at divine invocation become sculpted keepers, and are granted the honor of the lion dance.
Aquisition: Dropped by Divine Beast Warriors, Enir Ilim

name: Divine Bird Warrior Armor
Description: Armor of divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, made from a golden metal. The golden-hued divine birds are known to be cruel, never taking to human companionship. Those who invoked their divinity were few and far between.
Aquisition: Dropped by Divine Bird Warriors

name: Dryleaf Robe (Altered)
Description: Sun-faded and lightly soiled travel attire worn by clergymen. The leather satchel hanging from the shoulder is decorated with one of Miquella's emblems, a golden grass motif.
Aquisition: Alter Dryleaf Robe at any site of Grace.

name: Dryleaf Robe
Description: Sun-faded and lightly soiled travel attire worn by clergymen. The gold necklace found under the breast belongs to a group of spiritual seekers known as the Dryleaf Sect. This sect rejects dependence on others in all matters of faith, seeking self-discipline and self-sufficiency above all else.
Aquisition: Found under a waterfall in the lower portions under Bonny Village. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the mausoleum. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Finger Robe
Description: Robe of Count Ymir, High Priest. The front is open, exposing the squirming fingers beneath. This robe is the image of his fervent desire having broken free, laying bare his greatest wish, and wearing it enhances finger sorceries. "I will be the true mother. My fingers will grant us redemption!"
Special effect: Enhances Finger Sorceries by 8%
Aquisition: Once you obtain the High Priest Robe you can alter it at a grace site to become this robe.

name: Fire Knight Armor (Altered)
Description: Armor of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Each and every knight hailed from a renowned family of the Erdtree's upper echelons, but were shunned and chased from their homes after pledging allegiance to Messmer as their master.
Aquisition: Alter Fire Knight Armor at any site of grace.

name: Fire Knight Armor
Description: Armor of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Distinguished by its red cape and twin golden snakes which adorn the neck, enhancing incantations of Messmer's flame. These were the only ones who truly knew Messmer. His flames, like serpents. The painful fate that accompanied his accursed form.
Special effect: Enhances incantations of Messmer's flame by 5%.
Aquisition: Drop by Fire Knights in the Shadow Keep

name: Freyja's Armor (Altered)
Description: Golden armor of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights. After witnessing Freyja's valor as a gladiator in his youth, Radahn invited her to join the ranks of his most trusted warriors.
Aquisition: Alter Freyja's Armor at any site of grace.

name: Freyja's Armor
Description: Golden armor of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights. Affixed with a black woolen mantle. After witnessing Freyja's valor as a gladiator in his youth, Radahn invited her to join the ranks of his most trusted warriors.
Aquisition: Drop by Redmane Freyja.

name: Gaius's Armor
Description: The black iron chest armor of Commander Gaius. Part of an armor set patterned after fallen seeds. Gaius was the most senior disciple of the same Alabaster Lord who taught Radahn and Gaea gravitational technique.
Aquisition: Purchased from the Enia at the Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Gaius.

name: Gloried Attire
Description: Traditional garb of highland warriors, made from woven fabric and finished with fur. This garment is made from fabrics with both blue and red patterns. Red-patterned fabrics were allowed only to those who hunted bearsthe greatest and most glorious of the highlanders.
Aquisition: To the northwest of the Ravine North Site of Grace, there is a forest inhabited by runebears. At the center of this forest, you'll find a large stone with several items on it, this whole armor set is at the top of the stone. [Map Link]

name: Gravebird Armor
Description: Stone armor with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird. Gravebirds are ancient golems, created to guard the spiritgraves built where all manners of Death ultimately drift.
Aquisition: In the area, there are four statues of Gravebirds, and at the end is where you'll find the Armor. Once you approach the statues, at least 3 of them will turn into enemies. This location is situated to the far west of the Abandoned Ailing Village, nearly reaching the outer walls of Belurat, Tower Settlement. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Gravebird's Blackquill Armor
Description: Stone armor with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird. Featuring a cape of black Deathbird feathers, it enhances jumping attacks. Gravebirds are ancient golems, created to guard the spiritgraves built where all manners of Death ultimately drift.
Special effect: Increases Jump attack damage by 10%
Aquisition: From the Temple Town Ruins site of grace head north, past the Red Pests servants of rot, and stick to the left. The path will start to head upwards and you will find several Gravebirds. Continue upwards and you will eventually reach an area where there are gravebird statues at the side, in the middle, against the wall, you will find the armor. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: High Priest Robe
Description: Robe of Count Ymir, High Priest. Conceals the abundance of squirming beneath. Gold embroidery decorates the purple cloth, with a jewelled ruff that sparkles like a flower wet with dew.
Aquisition: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers, who can be found in the Cathedral of Manus Metyr after interacting with the throne, you can only find Count Ymir there after you have defeated Metyr, Mother of Fingers. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Highland Attire
Description: Traditional garb of highland warriors, made from woven fabric and finished with a blue patterned cloth. Highland warriors are known to be hunters of bears; to them, there is no act more glorious than the subjugation of a savage beast.
Aquisition: Found laying on the grounds in the middle of the woods, alongside the rest of the Highland Warrior Set. [Map Link]

name: Horned Warrior Armor
Description: Armor of the horned warriors, keepers of the tower. The ochre fabric is draped over a chest-piece made to resemble the unclothed form of a hero from older times.
Aquisition: Drops from Horned Warriors ( Small Private Altar site of grace in Belurat, Tower Settlement)

name: Igon's Armor (Altered)
Description: Armor of the broken drake warrior Igon, from a set comprised of a miscellany of parts. Patched with scraps of cloth. The poor scavenger of battlefields found honor through Dragon Communion.
Aquisition: Alter Igon's Armor at a site of grace.

name: Igon's Armor
Description: Armor of the broken drake warrior Igon, from a set comprised of a miscellany of parts. Filthy belongings are attached to this tattered piece of protective-wear. The poor scavenger of battlefields found honor through Dragon Communion.
Aquisition: Loot Igon after defeating Bayle the Dread.

name: Iron Rivet Armor
Description: Chest armor of Red Bear, whose name is lost to madness. A vest reinforced with iron rivets. After killing the great red bear in a blood-soaked bout, he became fascinated by the untainted glory of its naked strength. "I wish to be a bear, no more, and no less."
Aquisition: Dropped by Red Bear. Red Bear can be found at the Northern Nameless Mausoleum. The Northern Nameless Mausoleum is located East of the Temple Ruins. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Leda's Armor
Description: Chest armor of Needle Knight Leda. Slightly strengthens attacks following a dodge roll or backstep, as well as dash attacks. Embroidered with a golden crossed-tree motif, the chalk white cloak and surcoat symbolize the honor of the Needle Knights. "Kindly Miquella fashioned us as his needles to quell all, to ward away all."
Special effect: Slightly strengthens attacks following a dodge roll or backstep, as well as dash attacks.
Aquisition: Found on Needle Knight Leda's body after invading and defeating her

name: Messmer Soldier Armor (Altered)
Description: Armor worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler. The mail has rusted while fighting in unending war. Though the chestpiece features a Scadutree motif, gold has been used for its engraving. A small consolation to those forced to wage a war without grace or honor.
Aquisition: Alter Messmer Soldier Armor at any site of grace.

name: Messmer Soldier Armor
Description: Armor worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler. A ragged cloak is draped over rusted mail. Though the chestpiece features a Scadutree motif, gold has been used for its engraving. A small consolation to those forced to wage a war without grace or honor.
Aquisition: Drop by Messmer Soldiers

name: Messmer's Armor
Description: Black armor of Messmer the Impaler. Draped with a red cloak bearing his crest embroidered. On his mother's wishes, Messmer made himself a symbol of fear, undertaking the cleansing crusade she desired. "Direct thy maledictions, thine ire, and thy grief towards me alone."
Aquisition: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Messmer the Impaler

name: Oathseeker Knight Armor
Description: Oathseeker Knight chest armor. Black with gold ornamentation. These knights set off on quests of discovery, hoping to find by themselves an oath of their own choosing to serve in perfect, lifelong devotion.
Aquisition: Found inside a hanging body, just outside the Church of Benediction. It contains the whole set: Oathseeker Knight Greaves, Oathseeker Knight Gauntlets, Oathseeker Knight Armor, and Oathseeker Knight Helm. It also contains Pata weapon. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Rakshasa Armor
Description: Armor of Rakshasa, soaked in the spurting blood of her victims. Tatters of ragged cloth jut out haphazardly, as if her lust for carnage threatens to break free.Increases damage dealt to foes, but greatly increases damage taken by the wearer.Cut down and devour. Only those who repeat the cycle without rest can truly subvert the self and become Rakshasa.
Special effect: Boosts All Damage by 2%
Aquisition: Dropped by Rakshasa in Eastern Nameless Mausoleum. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the mausoleum. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Rellana's Armor
Description: Ornate armor of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight, fashioned from silver steel. Adorned with the lapis-lazuli blue that is symbolic of Caria, its radiance is yet to fully fade.
Aquisition: The complete set (Rellana's Set) can be bought from Enia in the Roundtable Hold upon defeating Rellana Twin Moon Knight.

name: Shadow Militiaman Armor
Description: Armor as dark as shadow, worn by vulgar militiamen. Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. What better place than the realms of shadow then, for such an army?
Aquisition: can be found by killing Shadow Militiaman enemies

name: Thiollier's Garb (Altered)
Description: The dark attire of those who wield poison in secret.Countless needles are sewn onto the exterior for talismanic effect.
Aquisition: Alter Thiollier's Garb at any site of grace.

name: Thiollier's Garb
Description: The dark attire of those who wield poison in secret. The silver hair is arranged in the same style as St. Trina's, increasing arcane. Additionally, countless needles are sewn onto the exterior, apparently for talismanic effect.
Special effect: Increases Arcane by +2
Aquisition: Summon Thiollier during the battle at the end of his questline, then loot his body in the boss arena after the fight

name: Verdigris Armor
Description: Chest armor made from an unusual metal known as verdigris. Verdigris is said to be the gift of an outer god. Possessed of an enormously hefty yet supple strength thanks to its rusted nature.
Aquisition: Complete Moore's questline

name: Young Lion's Armor (Altered)
Description: The golden armor worn by Radahn in his younger years. Worn by a fierce lion. When Malenia, Blade of Miquella, let the rotflower blossom in Aeonia, Radahn heard a murmur in his ear "Miquella awaits thee, O promised consort."
Aquisition: Alter Young Lion's Armor at any site of grace.

name: Young Lion's Armor
Description: The golden armor worn by Radahn in his younger years. Proudly adorned with heroic red accents, it is fitting attire for a lion. When Malenia, Blade of Miquella, let the rotflower blossom in Aeonia, Radahn heard a murmur in his ear "Miquella awaits thee, O promised consort."
Aquisition: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Promised Consort Radahn / Radahn, Consort of Miquella in Enir-Ilim [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Alberich's Bracers
Description: Mad Tongue Alberich's bracers.Set with red glintstones said to be formed by the blood of sacrifices. Strengthens thorn sorcery. Alberiches was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
Special effect: Strengthens thorn sorcery
Aquisition: Found at the lower level of the Fortified Manor at Leyendell Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

name: All-Knowing Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.
Aquisition: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story.Elden Ring Map here

name: Astrologer Gloves
Description: Gloves fashioned from fine, supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.
Aquisition: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for 1000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Azur's Manchettes
Description: Manchettes corroded by blue-green glintstones.Worn by Azur, primeval current sorcerer.Azur had reached a near-inorganic state.
Aquisition: After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline and siding with her towards the end, return to Primeval Sorecerer Azur's location. Azur's Glintstone Manchettes will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.Elden Ring Map here

name: Bandit Manchettes
Description: Manchettes made by simple wrapping dirty cloth around the arms. Worn by bandits.
Aquisition: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.Gatekeeper Gostoc will sell it after entering Stormveil Castle, but before killing Godrick the Grafted. After that, you will have to kill him for his Bell Bearing. Elden Ring Map hereCan be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after offering Gostoc's Bell Bearing

name: Banished Knight Gauntlets
Description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body.These gauntlets were worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes.These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.
Aquisition: Dropped from the Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.

name: Battlemage Manchettes
Description: Manchettes worn by scholars of the Raya Lucaria Academy, tattered from being worn on the battlefield.
Aquisition: This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge. Elden Ring Map Link.

name: Beast Champion Gauntlets
Description: Silver gauntlets engraved with tiny beasts.Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.Beasts are drawn to champions, and to lords. And this armor befits a champion worthy of becoming a lord. And that is what Bernahl was.Until his maiden threw herself into the fire.
Aquisition: Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set with an altered version of the chest piece.Elden Ring Map here.

name: Black Knife Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets used by the Black Knife Assassins. Crafted with scale armor that makes no sound. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.
Aquisition: Can be found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds. Elden Ring Map here

name: Blackflame Monk Gauntlets
Description: Black iron gauntlets featuring a flame motif.Attire of the Blackflame Monks.The Blackflame Monks, enthralled by the god-slaying black flame, became traitors, abandoning their posts as guardians. The seduction of a taboo is never easily spurned.
Aquisition: Drop from Blackflame monks.

name: Blaidd's Gauntlets
Description: Well-worn black gauntlets of the man-wolf Blaidd.Blaidd, who served as Ranni's shadow, was a loyal ally who would defy destiny itself if it would have him turn upon his Lady.
Aquisition: Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).Elden Ring Map here

name: Bloodhound Knight Gauntlets
Description: Metal gauntlets of the Bloodhound Knights. The Bloodhound Knights are trained as hunters and known to be unshakable trackers. Without the use of language, each knight chooses his own master. Once the decision has been made the knight stays loyal for life.
Aquisition: Drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Bloodsoaked Manchettes
Description: Manchettes formed from tightly-wound bandages soaked through with blood. Any protection is welcome for the festering arms beneath.
Aquisition: Looted from a corpse in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds near the Underground Roadside site of grace.Elden Ring Map here

name: Blue Silver Bracelets
Description: Bracelets crafted with blue silver.Worn by the wolf-riding Albinauric archers.Blue silver is a metal born from the same mother as the archers themselves, and provides protection from magic and frost.
Aquisition: Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

name: Briar Gauntlets
Description: Battered iron gauntlets from a foreign land.Worn by Elemer of the Briar. The winding, rusted iron briars are a mark of the guilty and typically indicate a sentence of death. They also cause this armor to deal damage when performing dodge rolls.Elemer murderd numerous instructors and merchants, and was known as the Bell Bearing Hunter.
Aquisition: Purchased from the Palm Reader in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle.

name: Bull-Goat Gauntlets
Description: Great Horned Tragoth's gauntlets. Covers its wearer with a pair of giant horns, providing staunch poise. Tragoth is a famed knight of assistance. Countless Tarnished, facing adversity in the Lands Between, have survived thanks only to the Great Horned One's aid.
Aquisition: Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth.Elden Ring Map here

name: Carian Knight Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of the enchanted knights that once served the Carian royal family.The enchanted knights, anointed by the Lunar Queen, were heroes of the highest honors, but fell into disarray with the decline of the royal family.
Aquisition: You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy.Elden Ring Map hereTo find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

name: Chain Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Time has yet to dull their luster.
Aquisition: Fort Haight.: Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort walls.

name: Champion Bracers
Description: Bracers reserved for the bandlands' bravest. Proof that the wearer has slaughtered countless foes. Following the example of their chieftain Hoarah Loux, the brave warriors of the badlands shun excess adornment.
Aquisition: Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for 1,000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Cleanrot Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of the Cleanrot Knights, celebrated for their undefeated campaign in the Shattering.The Cleanrot Knights vowed to fight alongside Malenia, despite the inevitable, if gradual, putrefaction of their flesh. Their acceptance of their fate made these battles fiercest of all.
Aquisition: Drops from non-boss versions of Cleanrot Knights, found at Inner Aeonia and Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Confessor Gloves
Description: Black leather gloves of the church confessors. The churches outside the Lands Between, dedicated to the teachings of the Two Fingers, send confessors out to follow the guidance of grace. The confessors are loyal servants to the Two Fingers, ready to hunt down and quietly dispose of their enemies.
Aquisition: Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for 1000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Crucible Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of the Crucible Knights who served Godfrey, the first Elden Lord.Hold the power of the crucible of life, the primordial form of the Erdtree. Strengthen Aspects of the Crucible incantations.In time, the strength shown by these knights, and even their appearance, was seen as chaotic and deserving of scorn.
Special effect: Strengthen Aspects of the Crucible incantations.
Aquisition: Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis, located at Auriza Hero's Grave.Elden Ring Map hereFound with the Crucible Tree Set in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a mini-boss: Crucible Knight Siluria.Elden Ring Map here

name: Cuckoo Knight Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy knights.Time has yet to dull their luster.
Aquisition: Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo Knights. There are three nearby to the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of grace.

name: Depraved Perfumer Gloves
Description: Gloves worn by depraved perfumers.These heresy-inclined perfumers imbibe their own spices to alter body and mind. Their slow descent into self-destruction is what earned them their name.
Aquisition: The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle

name: Drake Knight Gauntlets
Description: Black iron gauntlets worn by drake knights.Features the spoils of a dragon catch as an emblem of pride as both dragon hunter and partaker of communion.From birth, drake knights speak not a word. They spend their lives pursuing the strength of dragons, for its sublime beauty and inspiration of awe
Aquisition: You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.Elden Ring Map hereTravel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

name: Eccentric's Manchettes
Description: The knight Jerren's manchettes. Jerren preferred a nomadic existence, but after spending time as a guest of the Carian royals, he became the guest commander for General Radahn. And for the first time, the restless tumbleweed would be bound by honorable oath.
Aquisition: This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline. Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya Lucaria Academy.Elden Ring Map here

name: Elden Lord Bracers
Description: Bracers of Godfrey the first Elden Lord.The age of the Erdtree began amongst conflict, when Godfrey was lord of the battlefield.He led the War against the Giants. Faced the Storm Lord, alone. And then, there came a moment. When his last worthy enemy fell. And it was then, as the story is told, that the hue of Lord Godfrey's eyes faded.
Aquisition: Available from Enia after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

name: Errant Sorcerer Manchettes
Description: Commonplace leather manchettes.Their hands are inlaid with dulled glintstone.
Aquisition: Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village.Elden Ring Map here

name: Exile Gauntlets
Description: Damaged iron gauntlets. Worn by soldiers sent to the penal colonies.
Aquisition: Drop from Exile Soldiers.

name: Fingerprint Gauntlets
Description: Iron gauntlets singed and blistered by fingers. Worn by Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold. No other Tarnished was closer to the throne of the Elden Lord than Vyke. But without announcement, Vyke traveled far below the capital, and was scorched by the flame of frenzy. Did he make his choice for his maiden, or did some other force lure him with suggestion?
Aquisition: Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon defeat. Elden Ring Map here

name: Fire Monk Gauntlets
Description: Black iron gauntlets featuring a flame motif. Attire of the Fire Monks. The Fire Monks are guardians of the flame of ruin, forbidden by the Erdtree and said to be kept high in the Mountaintops of the Giants.
Aquisition: Dropped by Fire Monks found in camps in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintop of the Giants.

name: Fire Prelate Gauntlets
Description: Black iron gauntlets with the appearance of flames.Attire of the Fire Prelates, commanders of the Fire Monks.The weighty frames of the Prelates symbolized the onus of their grave vows as guardians of the flame. "Etch this sight upon thine breast. Of my thunderous gravity."
Aquisition: Dropped by Fire Prelates.One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

name: Foot Soldier Gauntlets
Description: Metal gauntlets covered in nicks and dents. Widely issued to foot soldiers in a lord's army.
Aquisition: Dropped by Foot Soldier-type Soldier enemies. Defeat a Foot Soldier to gain a chance to obtain this item. Foot Soldiers can be found protecting the Purified Ruins.

name: Gelmir Knight Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by knights once loyal to Praetor Rykard. Time has yet to dull their luster.
Aquisition: You can loot the entire Gelmir Knight Set in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon from a Gelmir Knight corpse.Elden Ring Map here.

name: Godrick Knight Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by knights loyal to Godrick the Grafted. Time has yet to dull their luster.
Aquisition: Fort Haight.: Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort walls.

name: Godrick Soldier Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers loyal to Godrick the Grafted.Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
Aquisition: Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost.

name: Godskin Apostle Bracelets
Description: Black bracelets of the Godskin Apostles.The apostles, once said to serve Destined Death, are wielders of the god-slaying black flame. But after their defeat by Maliketh, the Black Blade, the source of their power was sealed away.
Aquisition: Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of Caelid.Elden Ring Map here

name: Godskin Noble Bracelets
Description: Black bracelets of the Godskin Nobles. Nobles are the most ancient apostles who are said to have assimilated inhuman physiology. Not unlike the crucible, the Erdtree in its primordial form.
Aquisition: Dropped by Godskin Noble Bossfight.Elden Ring Map here.

name: Gold Bracelets
Description: Bracelets made in the image of Erdtree branches.Minimal adornments made by Lord Goldmask's disciples.Those disciples have long since left him.
Aquisition: Gold Bracelets can be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Capital of Ash site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Look the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find the rest of his set on his body.Elden Ring Map here

name: Gravekeeper Cloak (Altered)
Description: Defensive wear encircled by bronze snakes. Worn by gladiators who were driven from the colosseum. The wearer becomes a slightly easier target for foes. The snake is viewed as a traitor to the Erdtree, and the audience delighted in seeing these bronze effigies beaten and battered.
Aquisition: After completing Boc's Questline, you (or Boc) can alter Gravekeeper Cloak into Gravekeeper Cloak (Altered).

name: Guardian Bracers
Description: Engraved golden bracers.Worn by the guardians of the Minor Erdtree.In accordance with an ancient pact with the Erdtree, it is said that their deaths led not to destruction, but instead to renewed, eternal life as guardians.
Aquisition: Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from the Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.

name: Haligtree Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to the Haligtree. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
Aquisition: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Haligtree Knight Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by knights sworn to the Haligtree.Time has yet to dull their luster.
Aquisition: Drops from Haligtree Knights, they can be found in the latter areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Highwayman Gauntlets
Description: Hideously stained and dented gauntlets.Worn by former foot soldiers who have turned to banditry.
Aquisition: Dropped by the Bandits found in Murkwater Cave.

name: Hoslow's Gauntlets
Description: Garish silver gauntlets decorated with red embellishments. Passed down through the Hoslow family.When Juno Hoslow received an invitation to the Volcano Manor, he discreetly refused."I have already walked many a road drenched in blood, yet never would I consider myself a champion."
Aquisition: All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.Juno Hoslow is a Hostile NPC that you can invade after progressing through the questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty.Elden Ring Map here

name: Iron Gauntlets
Description: Ordinary iron gauntlets.
Aquisition: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for 1500 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Kaiden Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by Kaiden sellswords. These hulking, fearless mercenaries, said to hail from the mountaintops of the wintry north, are adept at fighting on horseback. Kaiden is the name of their home settlement.
Aquisition: Dropped by Northern Mercenaries and Mounted Northern Mercenaries found in Limgrave.

name: Knight Gauntlets
Description: Iron gauntlets of an unknown knight. It is made of thin iron plate. Such metal armor is heavy, but provides considerable damage negation.
Aquisition: Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 3,000 Runes.

name: Land of Reeds Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets wrapped in tough leather.Worn by the warriors of the Land of Reeds
Aquisition: Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Leather Gloves
Description: Lightweight and battle-proven leather gloves worn by a savvy soldier.Many admire the wearer of this armor for his chivalrous and forthright spirit.
Aquisition: Murkwater Cave. Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for mercy. Elden Ring Map here

name: Leyndell Knight Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by knights sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell. Time has yet to dull their luster
Aquisition: Dropped by Gold Dragon Cult Knights.Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Leyndell Soldier Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers sworn to defend the royal capital of Leyndell.Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
Aquisition: May drop from Knights in Leyndell Royal Capital.

name: Lionel's Gauntlets
Description: Founded iron gauntlets. Worn by Lionel the Lionhearted. When this chivalrous dauntless knight met Fia, who had been driven from her home, he declared himself to be her father.
Aquisition: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

name: Lusat's Manchettes
Description: Manchettes corroded by blue glintstones. Worn by Lusat, primeval current sorcerer.Lusat had reached a near-inorganic state.
Aquisition: All three armor pieces can be found after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline and siding with Sellen, return to Lusat's location in the Sellia Hideaway. The entire set will be on the ground where he used to occupy.Elden Ring Map here

name: Malenia's Gauntlet
Description: Gauntlet made of unalloyed gold. Worn by Malenia, Blade of Miquella. Malenia awaited Miquella at the foot of the husk. "My brother will keep his promise. He possesses the wisdom, the allure, of a godhe is the most fearsome Empyrean of all."
Aquisition: Purchased from Enia for 12,000 runes after defeating Malenia Blade of Miquella.

name: Malformed Dragon Gauntlets
Description: Malformed golden gauntlets.Adorned with various dragon imagery and worn by the misshapen Tree Sentinels.After the great ancient dragon Gransax attacked, the sentinels had an epiphany. The only way to truly protect the Erdtree was to become dragons themselves.
Aquisition: Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.Elden Ring Map here

name: Maliketh's Gauntlets
Description: Beast's gauntlets made of black iron and decorated with gold. Worn by Maliketh the Black Blade.Maliketh, Queen Marika's loyral half-brother, bore a blade imbued with Destined Death, and there was not one demigod who did not fear him. Champions knew what was at stake. Indeed, that is what made them champions
Aquisition: Bought from the Enia in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh, the Black Blade.

name: Mausoleum Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by headless soldiers who endlessly guard the Wandering Mausoleum.Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
Aquisition: Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

name: Mausoleum Knight Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by headless knights who endlessly guard the Walking Mausoleum.Time has yet to dull their luster.
Aquisition: Mausoleum Knight Set pieces are dropped by Mausoleum Knights, typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset quickly with the site of grace.

name: Mushroom Arms
Description: Mushrooms found growing all over the body. These overgrown mushroom have colonized the arms. To those enraptured by the scarlet rot, they are holy vestments that root one to the earth.
Aquisition: Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and a Giant Poison Flower.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Noble's Gloves
Description: Gloves of plush leather. Worn by expatriated royalty. A gift of such rare beauty, a royal wouldn't disgrace their illustrious heritage even if found dead, in a ditch, in the middle of nowhere, while wearing such splendid raiment.
Aquisition: The Noble's Gloves along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women.Elden Ring Map here

name: Nox Monk Bracelets
Description: Monastic bracelets of the Eternal City.Long ago, the Nox invoked the ire of the Greater Will, and were banished deep underground. Now they live under a false night sky, in eternal anticipation of their liege. Of the coming age of the stars. And their Lord of Night.
Aquisition: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

name: Omen Gauntlets
Description: Malformed Gauntlets resembling an Omen with its horns cut off.Worn by the Dung Eater, their form is a vision of the landscape of his mind, and of his appearance as he wished to see it.The heart of an Omen without the body to match; could there be a crueler existence? What does it matter, then, if the curse claims it all?
Aquisition: The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds at the Leyndell Royal Capital.Elden Ring Map here

name: Omenkiller Long Gloves
Description: Long, stiff leather gloves worn by the Omenkillers.
Aquisition: Dropped by an Omenkiller enemy at Perfumer's Ruins, together with Omenkiller Robe and Omenkiller Boots.Elden Ring Map here.

name: Perfumer Gloves
Description: Gloves of an Erdtree Capital perfumer.In time past, the role of perfumer was much respected; a blessed apothecary in the eyes of the many. But after entering the battlefields of the Shattering they performed no such role, trading their aromatics for poisons and explosives.
Aquisition: Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Preceptor's Gloves
Description: Gloves of the magic preceptors who serve the Carian royals.Black and perfectly discreet.
Aquisition: Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Queen's Bracelets
Description: Bracelets indicating the highest order of sorcerer. Worn by Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon. When Rennala, head of both the Academy of Raya Lucaria and the Carian royal family, lost her husband Radagon, her heart went along with him. And then, those at the academy realized. That Rennala was no champion, after all.
Aquisition: Queen's Bracelets can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 7,000 Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.

name: Radahn Soldier Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers who fought by General Radahn's side.Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
Aquisition: Chace to drop from Radahn Soldiers, easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael.

name: Radahn's Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets depicting the golden lion. Worn by General Radahn. The golden lion is said to symbolize Godfrey, the first Elden Lord, and his beast regent, Serosh. From his youngest years, Radahn was naturally captivated by the Lord of the Battlefield.
Aquisition: The Radahn's Gauntlets Armor Gauntlets can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been defeated.

name: Raging Wolf Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by Vargram the Raging Wolf, one of the first Tarnished to visit the Roundtable Hold. According to the old legends, wolves are the shadows of the Empyrean. Vargram aspired to such a state himself.
Aquisition: Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Raya Lucarian Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by Raya Lucaria Academy soldiers. Rust-worn and stained through unending conflict.
Aquisition: Can be dropped by Raya Lucaria Knights.Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor after the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

name: Redmane Knight Gauntlets
Description: Black iron guantlets worn by knights who fought by General Radahn's side. Time has yet to dull their luster.
Aquisition: Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael.

name: Ronin's Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of the man who calls himself Shabriri.Highly functional and heavily worn.The man, once known as Yura, kept a woman in the deepest reaches of his heart.
Aquisition: Acquired by following Yura's questline.Elden Ring Map here

name: Royal Knight Gauntlets
Description: Silver gauntlets of Loretta, a knight who served Miquella's Haligtree. Loretta, once a royal Carian knight, went on a journey in search of a haven for Albinaurics, and determined that the Haligtree was their best chance for eventual salvation.
Aquisition: Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after defeating Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree for 4000.

name: Royal Remains Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets graces with gold human bones.Worn by the unspeaking adherent of Sir Gideon the All-Knowing.Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.It is said that the bones belong to an ancient lord - the soulless king. The lord of the lost and desperate, who was known as Ensha.
Special effect: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.
Aquisition: Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after beating him.

name: Scaled Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by Old Knight Istvan.The corroded metal is reinforced with rock-hard scales, making it high effective against non-physical attacks.Istvan is one of a few wizened Tarnished who survived to this day.
Aquisition: Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Old Knight Istvan.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Sorcerer Manchettes
Description: Manchettes worn by Raya Lucaria's magic scholars. Made by wrapping a simple cloth around the forearms.
Aquisition: They are dropped by Raya Lucaria Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Spellblade's Gloves
Description: Glintstone sorcerer Rogier's traveling attire, graced with an intricate, aristocratic decoration. Strengthens glintstone sorcery skills.Rogier spent his entire life behaving with utter detachment. No one noticed the anger, grief, regret, or fear that existed along with it.
Special effect: Strengthens magic and cold weapon skills by 2%
Aquisition: Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

name: Traveler's Gloves
Description: Gloves of a traveling perfumer of no renown. An associate of a healer, he is said to be in search of new aromatics and flower gardens, in hopes of treating Misbegotten, Omen and all those seen as impure.
Aquisition: Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's Set.Elden Ring Map here

name: Traveler's Manchettes
Description: Light yet sturdy leather manchettes.Worn by young women who set off into the world to confront their fate.
Aquisition: Just before fighting Malenia, at the Haligtree Roots site of grace in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree, there is a side room with a large blooming red flower. Melina's Set pieces are looted in front of the flower. Elden Ring Map here

name: Traveling Maiden Gloves
Description: Gloves worn by traveling maidens.Maidens traversed the Lands Between for different reasons. Some to seek audience with the Fingers. Others, to find the Tarnished who they were destined to guide.
Aquisition: On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here.Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Tree Sentinel Gauntlets
Description: Golden gauntlets of the heavy cavalry Tree Sentinels who serve the Erdtree.Imposingly sturdy and nigh unbreakable, the grace of old yet lingers.
Aquisition: See the Tree Sentinel Set page for a guide on how to attain the set.Elden Ring Map here

name: Twinned Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets depicting entwined twins of gold and silver. The two known as D are inseparable twins.They are of two bodies and two minds, but one single soul. Not once do they stand together; not one word do they speak to one another.Perhaps this armor longs to find its way to the other D.
Aquisition: Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter.Elden Ring Map hereObtained at end of D Hunter's questline.

name: Vagabond Knight Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of a knight banished form their motherland.Dirty and battered after enduring a lengthy vagabond journey.Metal armor is heavy, but also sturdy, offering significant damage negation.
Aquisition: Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the Giants for 1,000 Runes.Elden Ring Map here

name: Veteran's Gauntlets
Description: Old gauntlets that has seen many battles. Worn by Niall, the veteran general of Sol.Niall was a lone survivor who commanded spirits to defend his long-passed master.This aging general could not die, nor did he have anywhere to fade away.
Aquisition: Can be purchased from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after killing Commander Niall at Castle Sol Rooftop.

name: Vulgar Militia Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by lean, mean, and filthy militiamen.Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. This is where the vulgar militia serve, as untiring, unsung watchkeepers.
Aquisition: The Vulgar Militia Gauntlets Armor Gauntlets piece can be found by killing Vulgar Militiamen enemies around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of grace.

name: War Surgeon Gloves
Description: "Bloodstained white gloves of the war surgeons who were effectively mercy killers.Of the surgeons that were abducted by the Lord of Blood none were able to tame the accursed blood.None but Varre, that is; though he was an exception."
Aquisition: Dropped by killing one of three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum area of Siofra River, northwest of the Palace Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood filled lake. This one can be found adjacent to the Giant Crow enemy near the blood filled lake drop off.

name: Warrior Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of a nomadic warrior.Crafted from sturdy leather.
Aquisition: Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.Purchasable from Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria). Elden Ring Map here

name: White Reed Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of the White Reeds, fashioned from banded iron plates. Worn by the Inabam head disciples of the great swordsman Okina. The Inaba traveled in pursuit of not only the master who abandoned them, but also proper deaths, won honorably through hard-fought combat. To be a White Reed is to seek death; fitting for the Inaba, who desired nothingmore than to die by the sword.
Aquisition: Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Armor and White Reed Greaves can also be found on this corpse. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

name: Zamor Bracelets
Description: Bracelets worn by knights of Zamor, hailed as heroes in the War against the Giants. These long-lived warriors, clad in biting, freezing winds, are said to have been the mortal enemies of the Fire Giants since time immemorial.
Aquisition: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants.Elden Ring Map here

name: Ansbach's Manchettes
Description: Manchettes of Sir Ansbach. Black leather adorned with gold embroidery. Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills.
Special effect: Slightly enhances Blood Oath and dynastic skills by 3%.
Aquisition: Complete Sir Ansbach's questline all the way through the end, and side with him when facing Leda, and then Promised Consort Radahn/ Radahn, Consort of Miquella. After the fight is over, Sir Ansbach's body will be near the site of grace, alongside with his equipment and his Incantation. [Map Link]

name: Ascetic's Wrist Guards
Description: Wrist guards of the tower's ascetics which embody their commitment to an austere existence of strict self-control. In order to ascend from their mortal flesh into tutelary deities of the land, they heighten their spirituality through severe ascetic training.
Aquisition: Drop by Curseblade enemies

name: Black Knight Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by the Black Knights, servants of Messmer the Impaler. Black iron ornamented with gold. A rotten odor stubbornly clings to it. Perhaps it arises from the tainted nature of the blood that splattered upon it. Or perhaps it is the wearer's own blackened soul, festering after endless slaughter.
Aquisition: Black Knight Set pieces are dropped from Black Knights, found throughout the Lands of Shadow.

name: Braided Arm Wraps
Description: Ragged black cloth tied with braided cord. Attire of a vengeance-seeking hornsent.
Aquisition: Complete Hornsent quest. [Video Location]

name: Common Soldier Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of the rank-and-file soldiers of Messmer's army. A pitch-dark soot clings to it, much like the inner faces of the men who wore them.
Aquisition: Drop by soldiers in Castle Ensis

name: Dancer's Bracer
Description: Metal bracer of the Ranah dancers. Enhances the power of dancing attacks. Designed to protect the sword-wielding hand.
Special effect: Enhances the power of dancing attacks by 2.5%.
Aquisition: Dropped by defeating Dancer of Ranah at the Southern Nameless Mausoleum [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Interactive Map]

name: Death Knight Gauntlets
Description: Golden gauntlets of the Death Knights, adorned with an antiquated depiction of the Erdtree. Enhances skills and incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. These knights, once Godwyn's personal guard, quested to find their transfigured master's cadaver surrogatefor the coming age of the Duskborn.
Special effect: Enhances skills and incantations of the ancient dragon cult by 2%
Aquisition: Darklight Catacombs, on a Death Knight corpse

name: Divine Bird Warrior Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of divine bird warriors, the very first of all horned warriors, made from a golden metal. The golden-hued divine birds are known to be cruel, never taking to human companionship. Those who invoked their divinity were few and far between.
Aquisition: Dropped by Divine Bird Warriors

name: Dryleaf Arm Wraps
Description: Sun-faded and lightly soiled arm wraps. Wound tightly around the arms as if it might prevent them from being broken.
Aquisition: Found under a waterfall in the lower portions under Bonny Village. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the area. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Fire Knight Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of the Fire Knights under Messmer the Impaler's personal command. Each and every knight hailed from a renowned family of the Erdtree's upper echelons, but were shunned and chased from their homes after pledging allegiance to Messmer as their master.
Aquisition: Drop by Fire Knights in the Shadow Keep

name: Freyja's Gauntlets
Description: Golden gauntlets of Redmane Freyja, member of General Radahn's most distinguished knights. After witnessing Freyja's valor as a gladiator in his youth, Radahn invited her to join the ranks of his most trusted warriors.
Aquisition: Drop by Redmane Freyja.

name: Gaius's Gauntlets
Description: The black iron gauntlets of Commander Gaius. Part of an armor set patterned after fallen seeds. Gaius was the most senior disciple of the same Alabaster Lord who taught Radahn and Gaea gravitational technique.
Aquisition: Purchased from the Enia at the Roundtable Hold after defeating Commander Gaius

name: Gauntlets of Night
Description: Bottomless black gauntlets, cool to the touch.Flowing lines in the seeming shape of a fingerprint adorn the surface. Imprisons the wearer in utterly lightless dark.Bestowed upon those born deep underground, ordaining them as Swordhands of Night.
Aquisition: Bonny Gaol: Use the jar lift near the bridge twice to reach the top level of the gaol. First, hop on the jar, go to the bridge level, and activate the switch. Ride the jar lift for the second time to go to the top level. You can find the Night Set on a corpse laying on top of a table. [See SOTE Elden Ring DLC Map] [Video Link]

name: Gauntlets of Solitude
Description: Steel gauntlets of the Knights of the Solitary Gaol. Part of a heavy armor set that covers the whole body in overlapping plates of steel. The nameless mausoleums of the realm of shadow are said to hold the spirits of warriors who lost their names, or their hearts.
Aquisition: Can be obtained after defeating the Blackgaol Knight found inside Western Nameless Mausoleum. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Gravebird Bracelets
Description: Stone bracelets with a tinge of green. One of a set of armor pieces cast in the image of the Gravebird. Gravebirds are ancient golems, created to guard the spiritgraves built where all manners of Death ultimately drift.
Aquisition: South the Pillar Path Waypoint site of grace, from a corpse at the corner of the altar. [Map Link]

name: High Priest Gloves
Description: Gloves of Count Ymir, High Priest. Soft and well-tailored.
Aquisition: Dropped by Count Ymir, Mother of Fingers, who can be found in the Cathedral of Manus Metyr after interacting with the throne, you can only find Count Ymir there after you have defeated Metyr, Mother of Fingers. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Horned Warrior Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of the horned warriors, keepers of the tower, made from a thick metal.
Aquisition: Drops from Horned Warriors ( Small Private Altar site of grace in Belurat, Tower Settlement)

name: Igon's Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of the broken drake warrior Igon. No more than a mish-mash of tatters and remnonets stripped from a corpse found in the aftermath of a battle.
Aquisition: Loot Igon after defeating Bayle the Dread.

name: Iron Rivet Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of Red Bear, whose name is lost to madness. Reinforced with iron rivets. After killing the great red bear in a blood-soaked bout, he became fascinated by the untainted glory of its naked strength. "I wish to be a bear, no more, and no less."
Aquisition: Dropped by Red Bear. Red Bear can be found at the Northern Nameless Mausoleum. The Northern Nameless Mausoleum is located East of the Temple Ruins. [Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Leather Arm Wraps
Description: Arm wraps worn by highland warriors, made of sturdy leather and fastened with winding straps. Highland warriors are known to be hunters of bears; to them, there is no act more glorious than the subjugation of a savage beast.
Aquisition: To the northwest of the Ravine North Site of Grace, there is a forest inhabited by runebears. At the center of this forest, you'll find a large stone with several items on it, this whole armor set is at the top of the stone. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Messmer Soldier Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets worn by soldiers who serve Messmer the Impaler, rusted and crusted in filth from fighting in unending war.
Aquisition: Drop by Messmer Soldiers

name: Messmer's Gauntlets
Description: Black gauntlets of Messmer the Impaler. On his mother's wishes, Messmer made himself a symbol of fear, undertaking the cleansing crusade she desired. "Direct thy maledictions, thine ire, and thy grief towards me alone."
Aquisition: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Messmer the Impaler

name: Oathseeker Knight Gauntlets
Description: Oathseeker Knight gauntlets. Black with gold ornamentation. These knights set off on quests of discovery, hoping to find by themselves an oath of their own choosing to serve in perfect, lifelong devotion.
Aquisition: Found inside a hanging body, just outside the Church of Benediction. It contains the whole set: Oathseeker Knight Greaves, Oathseeker Knight Gauntlets, Oathseeker Knight Armor, and Oathseeker Knight Helm. It also contains Pata weapon. [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Rakshasa Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets of Rakshasa, soaked in the spurting blood of her victims. Tatters of ragged cloth jut out haphazardly, as if her lust for carnage threatens to break free.Increases damage dealt to foes, but greatly increases damage taken by the wearer.Cut down and devour. Only those who repeat the cycle without rest can truly subvert the self and become Rakshasa.
Special effect: Boosts All Damage by 2%
Aquisition: Dropped by Rakshasa in Eastern Nameless Mausoleum. This area can only be accessed by using the ladder in Shadow Keep to get down to a special teleport coffin (this Elden Ring Map location). This will take you to Ruins of Unte and you must follow the cliffs downstream and then carefully drop down to bottom level to reach the mausoleum. [Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Rellana's Gloves
Description: Gloves of Rellana, the Twin Moon Knight, fashioned from quality leather.
Aquisition: The complete set (Rellana's Set) can be bought from Enia in the Roundtable Hold upon defeating Rellana Twin Moon Knight.

name: Shadow Militiaman Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets as dark as shadow, worn by vulgar militiamen. Freshly-singed battlegrounds effusing with the stench of the dead. Forbidden lands that will be excised from the memory of history. What better place than the realms of shadow then, for such an army?
Aquisition: Found by killing Shadow militia men

name: Thiollier's Gloves
Description: The dark gloves of those who wield poison in secret, ever scorned and loathed.
Aquisition: Summon Thiollier during the battle at the end of his questline, then loot his body in the boss arena after the fight.

name: Verdigris Gauntlets
Description: Gauntlets made from an unusual metal known as verdigris. Verdigris is said to be the gift of an outer god. Possessed of an enormously hefty yet supple strength thanks to its rusted nature.
Aquisition: Complete Moore's questline

name: Young Lion's Gauntlets
Description: The golden gauntlets worn by Radahn in his younger years. When Malenia, Blade of Miquella, let the rotflower blossom in Aeonia, Radahn heard a murmur in his ear "Miquella awaits thee, O promised consort."
Aquisition: Purchase from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after defeating Promised Consort Radahn / Radahn, Consort of Miquella in Enir-Ilim [See Shadow of the Erdtree Map]

name: Alberich's Pointed Hat (Altered)
Description: Mad Tongue Alberich's robe.Alberich was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
Aquisition: Boc the Seamster can alter the original Alberich's Pointed Hat if you have it in your possession.

name: Alberich's Pointed Hat
Description: Mad Tongue Alberich's pointed hat, a sign of a heretical practitioner. Set with red glintstones said to be formed by the blood of sacrifices. Strengthens thorn sorcery. Alberiches was an aloof yet disturbed heretical sorcerer said to have been driven mad by jeering tongues during his service to the Roundtable Hold long ago.
Special effect: Strengthens thorn sorcery by 6%.
Aquisition: The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor, first floor Site of Grace. Elden Ring Map here

name: Albinauric Mask
Description: Made from the largely unaltered hide of a young Albinauric.Raises arcane, but reduces the HP recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears.A far cry from godskin, this Albinauric hide mask is the product of malicious mockery.
Special effect: +4 Arcane,reduces the HP recovered from Flask of Crimson Tears by 10%.
Aquisition: Found in Volcano Manor near the Guest Hall grace. Ascend the stairs to the top floor of the building. Head outside and take the ladder to your left onto the roof. Go to the back of the roof and jump off the right side to a balcony, then enter a room with an Omenkiller, the Albinauric Staff, and the Albinauric Mask. Elden Ring Map here

name: All-Knowing Helm
Description: Helm set with countless eyes and ears. Worn by Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing. Knowledge begins with the recognition of one's ignorance. The realization that the search for knowledge is unending. But when Gideon glimpsed into the will of Queen Marika, he shuddered in fear. At the end that should not be.
Aquisition: The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the All-Knowing upon defeat. He is fought in Leyndell, Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the Royal Capital accessible only after making significant progress in the story. Elden Ring Map here

name: Aristocrat Hat
Description: Leather hat decorated with a withered feather.Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital, and the belonging of a family which claims a knight as an ancestor.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are the pitiful product of unending life.
Aquisition: Drops from Soldier Aristocrats that can be found wandering the roads of most areas.

name: Aristocrat Headband
Description: Valuable headband featuring fine goldwork.Travel attire worn by nobles in the capital.Abandoning their birthplace after the Shattering, these undead wanderers are pitiful product of unending life.
Aquisition: Rare chance to drop from Aristocrat Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Aristocrat enemies that wander the roads of most areas.Easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins, south of the Road to the Manor site of grace.

name: Ash-of-War Scarab
Description: Gray scarab worn directly on the head.These scarabs roll clumps of Ashes of War during their labors.Slightly reduces the FP cost of skills, but increases damage taken.
Special effect: Reduces the FP cost of skills by ~14%. Increases damage taken by ~5%.
Aquisition: Behind the waygate on the Limgrave Tower Bridge that takes you to the Divine Tower of Limgrave on a broken section of the bridge. Elden Ring Map here

name: Astrologer Hood
Description: Hood fashioned from supple cloth. Worn by those who look to the cosmos above. They read fate in the stars, and are said to be heirs of the glintstone sorcerers. But alas, the night sky no longer cradles fate.
Aquisition: Starting Equipment for the Astrologer ClassCan be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes for 1,000 Runes. Elden Ring Map here.

name: Azur's Glintstone Crown
Description: Crown of Azur, primeval current sorcerer, set with a prominent blue-green glintstone.This crown replaced Azur's brain and skull altogether, and now, removed from his body, it is all but dead. What power remains within raises the potency of Azur's primeval current sorceries at the cost of additional FP consumption.
Special effect: Increases the damage of Comet Azur by 15%, and Glintstone Cometshard and Comet by 10%. Increases FP consumption from sorceries by 15%.
Aquisition: The complete Azur's Glintstone Set is found at Azur's location after completing Sorceress Sellen's questline where you side with her. Elden Ring Map here

name: Bandit Mask
Description: Mask of black cloth that covers the mouth. Favored by bandits for hiding their faces, it also provides some protection against poison.
Aquisition: Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in North Limgrave for 1500 Runes. Elden Ring Map here

name: Banished Knight Helm (Altered)
Description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body.This helm was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes.These fierce warriors were each and all accomplished. Perhaps that is why, despite their territorial losses, they were still named knights.
Aquisition: Stormveil Castle. Looted from the Banished Knight located next to the Chapel in the northwest section, where Sorcerer Rogier is located.

name: Banished Knight Helm
Description: Thick, full set of armor covering the entire body. This helm was worn by knights who, whether by misfortune or misdeed, were forced to abandon their homes. Perhaps the deep-red scarf was used to block the winds, for on the outskirts, the winds bite with a stinging fierceness.
Aquisition: Dropped by Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.

name: Beast Champion Helm
Description: Silver helm engraved with tiny beasts. Worn by Bernahl the Recusant.The beasts, their eyes and ears covered, represent an oath: "See nothing, hear nothing, doubt nothing, and carry on, along the path set in stone."
Aquisition: The entire Beast Champion Set drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. Either defeat him at Warmaster's Shack or defeat the Recusant Bernahl invasion in Crumbling Farum Azula. Location in Elden Ring Map here.

name: Black Dumpling
Description: "Mask forced on a victim's head to lend torture an extra degree of cruelty.It magnifies one's fears and makes them acutely aware of all forms of pain.Raises attack power when the wearer suffers from madness.When the Black Dumpling goes on, the torturer no longer seeks answers; only to inflict suffering without hope of relief."
Special effect: Raises attack (+10 % to all damage) when the wearer suffers from madness for 60 seconds
Aquisition: Dropped by the enemies found at Volcano Manor who wear it.

name: Black Hood
Description: Hood of lusterless black fabric that conceals its wearer's identity.In this world, there is very little that must necessarily be known.
Aquisition: In the Sage's Cave, in a treasure chest behind an illusory wall. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

name: Black Knife Hood
Description: Hood used by the Black Knife Assassins. The assassins that carried out the deeds of the Night of the Black Knives were all women, and rumored to be Numen who had close ties with Marika herself.
Aquisition: The entire Black Knife Set is found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds. Map Link.

name: Black Wolf Mask
Description: A mask fashioned after the head of a black wolf.Relic of an assassin who assumed the guise of Ranni the Witch's loyal shadow. The likeness is striking.
Aquisition: Found behind Seluvis's Rise, reached by running and jumping up the crumbling part of the wall near the entrance to the tower. Elden Ring Map here

name: Blackflame Monk Hood
Description: Mail hood of iron links covering a headband engraved with black flames.Attire of the Blackflame Monks.The Blackflame Monks, enthralled by the god-slaying black flame, became traitors, abandoning their posts as guardians. The seduction of a taboo is never easily spurned.
Aquisition: Drops from Blackflame Monks

name: Blackguard's Iron Mask
